item.title: Plan for site and blog
item.description: This site is very much a work in progress. I have many IndieWeb protocols I hope to implement in the near future, especially WebMentions. I also want to import many of my past ramblings from my previous blog (last used in 2014!) and maybe even from Facebook and Twitter. Still, I think it important to give a basic overview of what I plan to do here. This post will address two questions:

item.title: Motivation for renewed blog
item.description: I’ve been thinking a lot lately about the internet presence I wish to create for myself. With all of this year’s revelations on Facebook’s serious data mismanagement (Cambridge Analytica), political interference (Russian hackers), failure to control hate speech (Myanmar genocide), and—most recently—dishonest efforts to shift blame (oh boy, where to begin), the backlash against social media platforms as a whole has reached fever pitch. It has caused me to reflect on my own contributions to the direction the web takes and our legacy for future generations of internauts.
